Room.Name: Fruit Orchid
Room.ShortDescription: This area of the Garden is noted for the quality of fruit it produces.
Room.LongDescription: Every variety of fruit tree that exists seems to be here, and each has been carefully tended so that it produces only the very best fruit. A pair of trees near the path are drooping with beautiful ripe pears. The second level of the Garden is up a winding path to the southwest.
